title: What happens if I create a PROJECT:FIRST STRIKE Icon from Hextech crafting, but do not own the skin?
body: I don't know what to spend my cores on...

replies.body: You can get the project icon in all three colours if you have extra cores (that's what I would do tbh) even though it costs ip to get the caches, but you you won't get the special skin border that comes with them since you don't own the skin.

You get the icon, and if you buy the skin before the event ends (on the 16th) you will also get the first strike border for it.

However, you can apparently later turn your project cores into orange essence, after the event ends.
